body: Mo, When you mean model arguments do you mean the arguments that you specify on the right hand side of the OpenStudio for the measure? There is no way to pass these arguments through code until OpenStudio 2 is released? Therefore they have to be passed manually by opening up OpenStudio? Also is there some info on the OpenStudio release? See below:  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/xE1-ufgwx-*F0eTxvJvz3fObzg-sXWUeKmUfRtR*rmRccOXjAP-2DtxxWMUQAtMwyjbIEXvK-0EW6Tl4lN1H4ntUmKMcJYp7/Arguements.JPG)
